p.d: At his daughter's wedding, Ange learns that the body of a 12-year-old child has been discovered near a stream. Maybe a kidnapping went wrong? At the same time, Anna Filippi, with whom he was once hopelessly in love, reappears after mysteriously vanishing 18 years earlier. Directed by: Didier Le Pecheur (season 2, France, 2015) Screenplay: Kristel Mudry, Sébastien Vitoux Cast: Gérard Darmon (Ange Renucci), Yann Gael (Sébastien Le Tallec), Didier Ferrari (Toussaint Marchioni), Jeanne Bournaud (Lise Darcourt), Chloé Stefani (Joséphine Vissac), Nathanaël MaIni (Paul Versini), Caroline Proust (Anna), Alexandre de Seze (Bruno) Genre: detective
